item.title: Best Linux Software
item.description: Best Linux Desktop Software Awards per Category for 2017! hey! you do realize that this post is only written because i was bored to do anything else, right? also i want to make super clear that on these awards, we ran a set of completely democratic procedures, with a fully transparent voting. and by â€œweâ€ i mean â€œmeâ€, and by â€œvotingâ€ i mean a single vote! â€œmineâ€ ğŸ‘ i will try to cover some basic categories, but not everything!
